title: Incident
description: Schema for incident data to be submitted on-chain. All text fields are stored directly on Solana blockchain for censorship resistance.

perpetrator_name.description: Name of the person who committed the act (stored on-chain)

description.description: Full description of what happened (stored on-chain)

incident_date.description: Date when the incident occurred, format: YYYY-MM-DD (stored on-chain)

location.description: Location where the incident occurred (stored on-chain)

items.description: URI to media file on IPFS/Arweave (e.g., ipfs://Qm... or ar://...)

media_uris.description: URIs to evidence media files on decentralized storage (stored on-chain)
